name: cron-js-parser
description: Cron expression parser to human readable format from Expression as well as Individual values

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm package-lock.json && npm i

author: adagioneo
keywords: human readable cron from array of seconds
human readable cron from array of hours
human readable cron from array of minutes
human readable cron from array of days
human readable cron from array of months
human readable cron from array of Year
